The free forever social media aggregator 🙌
Curator helps you collate and display any social media feed, anywhere. Be up, running and driving conversions in 5 minutes.
Sign Up, free forever












You’re in great Company. Curator is used by small businesses, large organisations and everyone in between.




























Karen Murphy  Public Relations Manager, UNStudio
Curator is a wonderfully easy tool to use, with a clear and intuitive interface. The pricing is extremely competitive and the customer service second to none!









Steve Crombie  CEO, Totem
We chose Curator based on their highly competitive pricing and incredible interface. Not only that, their team gave 110% in helping craft the solution for our project.









Mike Vasavada  Director, Mobiddiction
We've been working Curator.io for a some time now to be integrated into our social wall solution offering. The team's been cooperative and responsive to deal with.














 How it works








×











What Is A Social Media Aggregator?
It pulls selected posts across multiple social media accounts to display them in a single, customisable and embeddable-anywhere feed. 
















Three Step Installation  Yep, it’s Easy.

 Connect your social media accounts
 Customise your feed
 Copy and paste the embed code




















Analytics and Reporting
See how many people viewed and interacted with your Curator feed. Get better at collating future feeds, attribute sales and prove your awesomeness.















All Networks
Curator supports Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube, Flickr, Tumblr, and RSS. We add new networks as sources when we find them.












Why Curator






Advanced Filtering
Keep your feed clean. Set rules to block things like bad language, trolls and anything off-brand.









Best Value
All the features of our competitors for a much lower cost. Start with our free forever plan.









Brandable
Beginners through to your admin or experts can customise your feed with full CSS and API access.









Hashtag Friendly
Tell Curator what hashtags to watch for and it’ll be all over it. No searching for you!

There’s a feature-rich, affordable Curator solution for everyone.
